name: Cavern Boom
description:
-Move with 8 degrees of freedom via the numpad (or by tapping the screen on mobile)

-Avoid fireballs and bats

-Use powers

-See how long you can survive

-How high a score can you get?

--Hitting bats with green fireballs is worth extra points

--Every move you make scores you points, the more turns you take before dying the higher your score!
